revised_title: New Fossil Reptilia Discoveries: Cynodontia and Related Species
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of fossil reptiles, specifically focusing on the Cynodontia division. New genera, such as Cynognathus and Tribolodon, are identified and analyzed, revealing similarities to mammals in skull and jaw structure. The study contributes to understanding the evolutionary relationships between reptiles and mammals.
